actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that disability retirement annuities shall not be terminated for certain disabled annuitants and to provide that certain annuitants whose disability retirement has been terminated be given priority in civil service placement.

summary.text: States that for purposes of Federal disability retirement persons over 55 years of age shall not have their disability annuity discontinued by reason of the restoration of such persons's earning capacity if such disability is permanent in nature and has continued for at least three years. Grants Federal hiring priority to persons whose Federal disability annuity has been terminated by reason of the restoration of such person's earning capacity.

titles.title: A bill to provide that disability retirement annuities shall not be terminated for certain disabled annuitants and to provide that certain annuitants whose disability retirement has been terminated be given priority in civil service placement.
